caseTitle: (Against the judgment dated 20.05.2009 passed by the Peshawar High Court, Abbottabad Bench in Criminal Revision No. 1 of 2008)
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Asif Saeed Khan Khosa
tagline: The accused had acted in a cruel and brutal manner and his conduct was nothing short of being callous because he and his co-accused had murdered one person and had injured three others in the courtyard of a mosque. In the peculiar background of the case, the partial compromise would not furnish a valid basis for reduction of the appellant's sentence of death to imprisonment for life.
